section_recommended.title: Best practices for billing and usage
section_recommended.description: Follow our best practices to track costs, automate billing, and explore billing options in IBM Cloud.

section_recommended.title: Viewing your usage
section_recommended.description: You can view your IBM Cloud usage details, including a summary of estimated charges for all services and resources that are used per month in your organizations, from the Usage page in the console

section_recommended.title: Managing payments
section_recommended.description: Depending on your account type, we offer multiple ways to best manage your payment methods.

section_videos.title: How can I manage billing and usage in IBM Cloud?

tiles.title: Save and share cost estimates
tiles.description: When you create an estimate, you can save each estimate's unique link to share or revisit directly through your browser.

tiles.title: Use feature and subscription codes to create new accounts
tiles.description: When you register for a new IBM Cloud account, you can use a feature code that you received from participating in a special event or a subscription code that you received by email. Instead of verifying your identity by entering your credit card information, click the option to Register with a code to complete the set up of your new account.

tiles.title: Service level discounts for accounts with the Pay as you go with Committed Use billing model
tiles.description: If you have an account with the Pay as you go with Committed Use billing model, you might be eligible to receive service-level discounts.
